name: Quick Move Buttons
description: Adds move buttons outside the Edit tab.

scale-btns.name: Button Scale
scale-btns.description: Change the scale of the transform buttons, <co>the draggable area will also be affected</co>. <cr>Must reopen the editor to take effect.</cr>

opacity-btn.name: Button Opacity
opacity-btn.description: Change the opacity of the transform buttons. <cr>This does not affect the UI backgrounds and applies whenever you drag the buttons.</cr>

scale-bg.name: Draggable Area Scale
scale-bg.description: Change the scale of the draggable area. <cg>Useful if you can't drag properly due to the area size.</cg> <cr>Must reopen the editor to take effect.</cr>

visible-bg.name: Show Button Background
visible-bg.description: Show the backgrounds of the transform buttons. <cr>Must reopen the editor to take effect.</cr>

menu-btn.name: Show Draggable Area
menu-btn.description: Show the draggable area for transform buttons.

no-dragging.name: Disable Dragging
no-dragging.description: Disable dragging on the transform buttons, keeping them in a fixed position. <cg>Useful to prevent accidental dragging.</cg>

presistent-btn.name: Persistent Button
presistent-btn.description: Always show the transform buttons, even when an object is not selected.
